title: Bernard Cornwell on the Last Kingdom
itunes:title: Bernard Cornwell on the Last Kingdom
itunes:subtitle: As the third series of the Anglo-Saxon drama is about to air, we speak to the renowned historical novelist Bernard Cornwell about his books that inspired the programmes, and about his writing career more broadly.
description:
As the third series of the Anglo-Saxon drama is about to air, we speak to the renowned historical novelist Bernard Cornwell about his books that inspired the programmes, and about his writing career more broadly.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
